page.title: 20THE RETAIL TRADE
page.content: The future of the south of the area will depend mainly on tourism and the wealth brought into the area by residents who work in London.This may mean a lessening of ordinary facilities-Eton High Street and Datchet have lost many small shops serving local needs and antique shops and restaurants proliferate.House prices make it difficult for anyone to enter the area from the Midlands or the North. In the north of the area the once prosperous trading estate has many empty premises leading to loss of employment The depression here is made more noticeable by the surrounding prosperity.A generous face-lift to the town centre may bring in some of the money available in the area for while Slough retracts,near-by Reading's retail trade continues to expand.
